room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: My husband and I did Prison Break and we had so much fun! We had great service, great staff and loved the look of the rooms. Definitely want to go back to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: So much fun! We didn't escape prison but it was fun trying! I would recommend this to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: This is one of the most innovative fun times I've had in awhile. I would totally recommend it to anyone looking to do something fun and new.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Our friends and I had never done anything like this, and we chose the Prison Break room. It was so much fun and a great challenge. Though it wasn't a technical success (we needed one hint at the very end), we made it out in the time. It was a great time!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: My friends and I came here for my birthday. We had never been to anywhere like this. We had the best time! It was so much fun and we can't wait to come back!!! Great staff as well.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Ended our triple date for Valentine's Day here and did the secret agent room! It was a blast. I definitely recommend it for any occasion and we can't wait to come back and try another room! The staff is definitely super nice too!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Escape Room Kansas City in Kansas City
review: Capped off a great birthday celebration by trying to escape. We had a lot of fun and of course frustrations working as a team against the clock. We were just a few steps away when the time ran out but this was a lot of fun and we can't wait to do it again!!
